name: grafana-monitoring
description: Grafana + PostgreSQL monitoring stack for task management app

scripts.db:connect: docker exec -it postgres-monitoring psql -U monitoring -d monitoring_db
scripts.db:backup: docker exec postgres-monitoring pg_dump -U monitoring monitoring_db > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d).sql
scripts.db:size: docker exec postgres-monitoring psql -U monitoring -d monitoring_db -c "SELECT pg_size_pretty(pg_database_size('monitoring_db'));"
scripts.db:cleanup: docker exec postgres-monitoring psql -U monitoring -d monitoring_db -c "SELECT cleanup_old_logs();"
scripts.db:count: docker exec postgres-monitoring psql -U monitoring -d monitoring_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_logs;"
